wsj.title: Time to Choose a Facebook Heir
wsj.topComment: Another reason not to have FB (which I haven't, for three to four years now).  I mean, what are my kids supposed to post on my behalf?  "Still dead!  LOL"

wsj.title: GOP Eyes Changes to Food Stamps
wsj.topComment: We need to focus legislation on single issues...SNAP has no reason to be in the Farm Bill...combining bad welfare law with bad farming law creates...garbage...especially in Washington.....It is time to let issues stand on their own merits!

wsj.title: Golden State: The Team That Eats Together
wsj.topComment:
I like the camaraderie and the team, but that Credit Card Roulette is an inside joke among millionaires.

This is like Donald Trump arguing over who picks up the Lunch tab. The top 12 Warrior players earn between $1 and 15 million per year and they a...
